titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4) to amend and extend certain laws relating to housing, community and neighborhood development and preservation, and shelter assistance for the homeless and displaced, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-140.
House Agreed by Voice Vote to Consider H.Res.191, a 2/3 Vote Being Required.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/10/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4 (housing and community development programs).
